Detailed Description

seDRMSecurityConstraints wraps the DRM <Security_Constraints> class.

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMSecurityConstraints::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference.

SE_CLS_DRM_SECURITY_CONSTRAINTS
